thread.title: Paris Jackson Covers Her First Ever Fashion Magazine!
thread.title_full: Paris Jackson Covers Her First Ever Fashion Magazine!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Paris Jackson Covers Her First Ever Fashion Magazine!
text:
2/21/2017 12:35 PM ET | Filed under: Fashion Smashion • Michael Jackson • Gucci • Carine Roitfeld • Cover Shot • Paris Jackson 
Looks like Paris Jackson is going to be fashion's newest darling! 
The blonde beauty covers CR Fashion Book in a bright blue Gucci dress and basically gets the coveted seal of approval from editor Carine Roitfeld , who was one of the first to book Gigi Hadid as well! 
Related: Paris Hits The Grammys Red Carpet 
Paris is definitely going places! 
Michael Jackson 's daughter was also interviewed for the publication by director Lee Daniels , and she spoke about being inspired by her father, saying: 
"All of my inspiration [comes from him]. I would say 99 percent of my inspiration comes from him, because he has always been my world. He is my roots." 
The 18-year-old spoke of music as well, clarifying whether she has any plans to pursue it in the future: 
"I write music for myself. I use it as a way to get stuff out. It's not something I see myself following career-wise. There are so many amazing artists in my family. If I were to do it as a career, it would change how I feel about music and I don't want that to happen." 
Finally, the budding starlet revealed what quality she wishes she could inherit from her father: 
"Definitely his strength. He was the strongest person I know and tried to do everything with as much love and kindness as possible." 
She seems like a strong young lady already! We wish her all the success!
